version_description:
- Fixed shop
- Supported more device models.

- Fixed shop
- Supported more device models.

* Fight through the final 10 levels of Chapter 2: Deadwood Desert
* Added Gold Mine to the Mine rotation. Collect gold and utilize fire-breathing dragons!
* Try out the challenging new Hard difficulty for Mines and Trials on brand-new maps.
* Cha

* Try out the challenging new Hard difficulty for Mines and Trials on brand-new maps.
* Cha

- Chapter 3 Howlmoore's Haunt is Live! Enjoy first 10 battles in the dark forests. More content is coming soon!
- Tournament now has a new rule: Top 5 scores of all your attempts will add up to your final score. We also features global top 50 players f

- Bug fixes.
- Trick-or-Treat with Viktor: Wildsky's Halloween event is live. Accompany our black-hearted Death Knight in his search for candy, acceptance, and love.

- 加入公会，与队友一起扫荡活动BOSS！
- 重新设计了矿井。矿井现在随时间产出资源。越高层数的矿井产出越多资源！

- Team up with Stix, the Reaper, and send the lost souls back to the afterlife where they belong, unlocking the unnerving Bone Colossus and Dark Summons spell as you go.

- Elite/Infernal Bosses have MVP rewar

- Team up with Stix, the Reaper, and send the lost souls back to the afterlife where they belong, unlocking the unnerving Bone Colossus and Dark Summons spell as you go.
- Guild Bosses now have unique abilities
- Elite/Infernal Bosses have MVP rewar

ilygold's Dream Journey
With the disease still ravaging Wildsky's lands, whimsical forest Nymph Lilygold has invited heroes from all over to take refuge in her enchanted forest retreat, promising to provide some distraction from the recent hardships.

ilygold's Dream Journey
